# Tidying Incidence per county dataset

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
df_incd = 
  read_csv("datasets/incd_county.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  mutate(
    county = str_extract(county, "^[^(]+")
  ) |> 
  filter(county %in% c("New York County", "Kings County", "Bronx County", "Richmond County", "Queens County"))
```
